New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 9 月 11 日，星期三 14:10:07 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Lotto Powerball: Punter crowned 16th multi-millionaire of 2024 after winning $4.3 million https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-powerball-punter-crowned-16th-multi-millionaire-of-2024-after-looking-43-million/VLCKNTKOGZHBDM6YXUITOWJAYM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-powerball-punter-crowned-16th-multi-millionaire-of-2024-after-looking-43-million/VLCKNTKOGZHBDM6YXUITOWJAYM/ Tonight's winner is the 16th punter to win Lotto's Powerball jackpot in 2024. Wed, 11 Sep 2024 09:46:07 +0000 The winning numbers were 3, 10, 15, 19, 22, 26. The bonus ball was 4 and the Powerball was 8.
Duck-stomping prison inmate Eruera Peratiaki makes $1000 donation to the SPCA https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/duck-stomping-prison-inmate-eruera-peratiaki-makes-1000-donation-to-the-spca/7DFEX6KZUZEBVKPLTS7EPFMD5M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/duck-stomping-prison-inmate-eruera-peratiaki-makes-1000-donation-to-the-spca/7DFEX6KZUZEBVKPLTS7EPFMD5M/ Ric StevensEruera Peratiaki threw apple at duck, chased it, kicked it and stomped on its head. Wed, 11 Sep 2024 08:00:00 +0000 The duck landed on a grassed area inside Hawke's Bay Regional Prison last December. Photo / Supplied
US election 2024 presidential debate: Kiwis say Vice-President Kamala Harris a clear winner over Donald Trump https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/us-election-2024-presidential-debate-kiwis-say-vice-president-kamala-harris-a-clear-winner-over-donald-trump/B5JZXVBE5VHVTGXYN6LFYQUMF4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/us-election-2024-presidential-debate-kiwis-say-vice-president-kamala-harris-a-clear-winner-over-donald-trump/B5JZXVBE5VHVTGXYN6LFYQUMF4/ More than 26,000 Kiwis cast their votes on who they believed had the upper hand. Wed, 11 Sep 2024 07:35:59 +0000 Republican US presidential candidate Donald Trump and Democratic Vice-President Kamala Harris clashed in a fiery debate. Graphic / NZME
Steven Cranston death: Police appeal for more information as investigation continues https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/steven-cranston-death-police-appeal-for-more-information-as-investigation-continues/N4B726TT35G3LHTGZQMCYNBKGM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/steven-cranston-death-police-appeal-for-more-information-as-investigation-continues/N4B726TT35G3LHTGZQMCYNBKGM/ Maryana GarciaPolice enquiries into the death are ongoing. Wed, 11 Sep 2024 07:14:50 +0000 Steven Cranston died on Wednesday when he was hit by a car while walking his dog near Raglan.

Wed, 11 Sep 2024 07:00:00 +0000 Steven Rex Richards was originally charged with indecent assault on a police officer, but it was later downgraded to common assault.
Hawke’s Bay: SPCA finds miniature horses left in overgrown paddock without enough water for months https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hawkes-bay-spca-finds-miniature-horses-left-in-overgrown-paddock-without-enough-water-for-months/SF23COLO45AUDIKT6LNK3XABUM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hawkes-bay-spca-finds-miniature-horses-left-in-overgrown-paddock-without-enough-water-for-months/SF23COLO45AUDIKT6LNK3XABUM/ Ric StevensTwo women who owned them are now banned from owning horses for five years. Bondage and discipline: Woman tells court strangling someone unconscious isn’t BDSM https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bondage-and-discipline-woman-tells-court-strangling-someone-uncious-isnt-bdsm/3G4SP7JC6RHAHOFDPWIWDDHZPY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bondage-and-discipline-woman-tells-court-strangling-someone-uncious-isnt-bdsm/3G4SP7JC6RHAHOFDPWIWDDHZPY/ Catherine HuttonThe man is accused of choking two women he met on Tinder until they blacked out. Wed, 11 Sep 2024 06:29:09 +0000 A second woman is giving evidence in the trial of a man accused of strangulation and injuring with intent to injure in the Wellington District Court.
Gift card expiry: Parliament passes bill setting a minimum period of three years https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/gift-card-expiry-parliament-passes-bill-setting-a-minimum-period-of-third-years/ZSGU24ZZMZFRTK2QVF2FR3MQME/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/gift-card-expiry-parliament-passes-bill-setting-a-minimum-period-of-third-years/ZSGU24ZZMZFRTK2QVF2FR3MQME/ Jamie EnsorAll but one party supported the legislation. Act MP Mark Cameron delivers emotional speech in Parliament after son’s death https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/act-mp-mark-cameron-delivers-emotional-speech-in-parliament-after-sons-death/Y2EBQ62MYRCK7F56B5GDH3S24M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/act-mp-mark-cameron-delivers-emotional-speech-in-parliament-after-sons-death/Y2EBQ62MYRCK7F56B5GDH3S24M/ Jamie EnsorThe MP described himself as 'a shadow of the man that boy would have become'.
